mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, product_id, parent_id, member_imgae, member_status, member_userid, comment, reg_date FROM tb_product_comment ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT count(id) FROM tb_product_comment WHERE product_id=#{product_id} ORDER BY id DESC

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT id, member_id, product_id, parent_id, member_imgae, member_status, member_userid, comment, reg_date , id as group_id, CAST(CONCAT(if(parent_id=0,id,parent_id ), parent_id) AS CHAR(99)) x FROM tb_product_comment x where parent_id=0 UNION ALL SELECT a.id, a.member_id, a.product_id, a.parent_id, a.member_imgae, a.member_status, a.member_userid, a.comment, a.reg_date , if(a.parent_id=0, a.id,a.parent_id) as group_id , CONCAT(b.x, '-', CONCAT(if(a.parent_id=0, a.id,a.parent_id), a.parent_id)) x FROM tb_product_comment a INNER JOIN CTE b ON a.parent_id = b.id ) select * from CTE WHERE product_id=#{product_id} order by group_id desc, x asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product_comment SET member_id=#{member_id}, product_id=#{product_id}, parent_id=#{parent_id}, member_imgae=#{member_imgae}, member_status=#{member_status}, member_userid=#{member_userid}, comment=#{comment}
